full_threads.body:
@heath please check if could be possible.

https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/special-event/

Hi Heath

Can you use the attached to create an Event Invitation which I’ll then email out to GP’s and Physios on our database

We’ll also need to set up an online Event Booking page.


CHEERS
JAMES


From: James Croll
Sent: Thursday, 5 September 2019 10:31 AM
To: Jessica Mcilwrath <info@drramawat.com.au <mailto:info@drramawat.com.au>>; Ian Fulton <Ian@sensesdirect.com.au <mailto:Ian@sensesdirect.com.au>>
Cc: Ian Fulton <Ian@sensesdirect.com.au <mailto:Ian@sensesdirect.com.au>>
Subject: RE: Latest Techniques - Sunil Ramawat.docx

Hi Ian …

Can you give us a quote for the design of a simple single flier? Attached.
It’s one-sided. Full colour.
The job will be invoiced to Jessica at Dr Ramawat’s business. Please cc her in.

Can you also give a print quote for 250 and 500 printed copies?

THANKS
JAMES


From: Jessica Mcilwrath [mailto:info@drramawat.com.au <mailto:info@drramawat.com.au>]
Sent: Wednesday, 4 September 2019 10:13 PM
To: James Croll <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au <mailto:James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Latest Techniques - Sunil Ramawat.docx

That might be best if you have someone that can get it done quicker 😊

Thanks

Jess
Get Outlook for iOS <https://aka.ms/o0ukef>


On Wed, Sep 4, 2019 at 3:19 PM +1000, "James Croll" <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au <mailto:James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>> wrote:

I have a contact if need be


From: info@drramawat.com.au <mailto:info@drramawat.com.au> [mailto:info@drramawat.com.au <mailto:info@drramawat.com.au>]
Sent: Wednesday, 4 September 2019 3:13 PM
To: James Croll <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au <mailto:James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Latest Techniques - Sunil Ramawat.docx

I think I have a contact person I can get it make it look a little nicer.

Leave it with me and I’ll send them an email 👍🏼

Get Outlook for iOS <https://aka.ms/o0ukef>


On Wed, Sep 4, 2019 at 3:12 PM +1000, "James Croll" <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au <mailto:James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>> wrote:

Do you have a designer Jess to make it look better?

From: Sunil Ramawat [mailto:sunilramawat@gmail.com <mailto:sunilramawat@gmail.com>]
Sent: Wednesday, 4 September 2019 2:35 PM
To: James Croll <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au <mailto:James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>>
Cc: info@drramawat.com.au <mailto:info@drramawat.com.au>
Subject: Re: Latest Techniques - Sunil Ramawat.docx

Looks good to me. Just fix the contact details.
Thanks

On Wed, 4 Sep 2019 at 1:55 pm, James Croll <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au <mailto:James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>> wrote:
Hi Jess / Sunil

Here’s the “first” draft of a suggested invitation. See attached. Do you want to edit it and finalise it?
You may want to get your designer to design it up so it looks nice. Then get them printed so that you can mail them out.

Send me back the final copy. I’ll then put create an email version and email it out to our database of GP’s

Bookings
People can book either online (I’ll create an online booking form on the Lakeview website) .. by phone .. email .. or by fax.
Jess – let me know if you want to put your phone, fax and email address on it?
Happy for it all to come to Lakeview if you wish then we can keep all the bookings in one place.

RGDS
JAMES
